punch.name: Punch
punch.description: Basic attack dealing 5 + STR + AGI + INT damage

fury.name: Fury
fury.description: Doubles action bar gain for 5 turns

natures_touch.name: Nature's Touch
natures_touch.description: Heals an ally for 20% max HP + INT

wild_growth.name: Wild Growth
wild_growth.description: Heals all allies for 10% max HP + (INT * 0.5)

beast_form.name: Beast Form
beast_form.description: Transform into beast form, gaining 50% STR and AGI

elemental_shield.name: Elemental Shield
elemental_shield.description: Shield an ally, absorbing damage equal to INT * 2

natures_army.name: Nature's Army
natures_army.description: Summon nature spirits to fight alongside you

eternal_rune.name: Eternal Rune
eternal_rune.description: Ultimate: Unleash ancient runic power dealing massive damage

natures_wrath.name: Nature's Wrath
natures_wrath.description: Ultimate: Channel the fury of nature to devastate all enemies

holy_light.name: Holy Light
holy_light.description: Divine healing restores 30% max HP to an ally

divine_shield.name: Divine Shield
divine_shield.description: Grant an ally immunity to damage for 2 turns

mass_heal.name: Mass Heal
mass_heal.description: Heals all allies for 15% max HP + INT

blessed_recovery.name: Blessed Recovery
blessed_recovery.description: Resurrect a fallen ally with 50% HP

prophecy_aura.name: Prophecy Aura
prophecy_aura.description: All allies gain 15% chance to dodge

heavens_wrath.name: Heaven's Wrath
heavens_wrath.description: Ultimate: Call down divine judgment on all enemies

divine_intervention.name: Divine Intervention
divine_intervention.description: Ultimate: Fully heal and cleanse all allies

poison_strike.name: Poison Strike
poison_strike.description: Strike with poison dealing AGI damage and applying poison for 3 turns

multishot.name: Multishot
multishot.description: Fire arrows at all enemies dealing AGI damage

aimed_shot.name: Aimed Shot
aimed_shot.description: Precise shot dealing 3x AGI damage with high crit chance

hunters_mark.name: Hunter's Mark
hunters_mark.description: Mark an enemy, increasing damage they take by 25%

eagle_eye_aura.name: Eagle Eye Aura
eagle_eye_aura.description: All allies gain 20% accuracy and critical chance

predator_aura.name: Predator Aura
predator_aura.description: All allies gain 30% damage vs marked enemies

perfect_shot.name: Perfect Shot
perfect_shot.description: Ultimate: Instant kill enemy below 30% HP, or deal massive damage

the_wild_hunt.name: The Wild Hunt
the_wild_hunt.description: Ultimate: Summon spectral beasts to hunt all enemies

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.description: Hurls a fiery projectile dealing INT * 2.5 damage

frost_armor.name: Frost Armor
frost_armor.description: Shield self with ice, reducing damage by 30% for 3 turns

arcane_explosion.name: Arcane Explosion
arcane_explosion.description: Explode with arcane energy, damaging all nearby enemies

mana_burn.name: Mana Burn
mana_burn.description: Burn enemy mana, dealing damage based on mana burned

wisdom_aura.name: Wisdom Aura
wisdom_aura.description: All allies gain mana regeneration and reduced cooldowns

meteor_storm.name: Meteor Storm
meteor_storm.description: Ultimate: Rain meteors from the sky

time_stop.name: Time Stop
time_stop.description: Ultimate: Freeze time for enemies for 2 turns

blade_strike.name: Blade Strike
blade_strike.description: Strike with your blade dealing STR * 2 damage

shield_bash.name: Shield Bash
shield_bash.description: Bash with shield, stunning for 1 turn

royal_charge.name: Royal Charge
royal_charge.description: Charge through enemies dealing damage to all

valor_aura.name: Valor Aura
valor_aura.description: All allies gain 25% damage and defense

vengeance_aura.name: Vengeance Aura
vengeance_aura.description: All allies reflect 30% of damage taken

divine_storm.name: Divine Storm
divine_storm.description: Ultimate: Spinning blade storm of divine fury

wrath_of_heaven.name: Wrath of Heaven
wrath_of_heaven.description: Ultimate: Channel divine vengeance on all enemies

shield_slam.name: Shield Slam
shield_slam.description: Slam with shield dealing damage based on defense

consecrate.name: Consecrate
consecrate.description: Consecrate the ground, damaging enemies over time

shadow_strike.name: Shadow Strike
shadow_strike.description: Strike from the shadows with dark energy

psi_storm.name: Psi Storm
psi_storm.description: Create a psionic storm damaging all enemies

psionic_aura.name: Psionic Aura
psionic_aura.description: All allies gain mind shield and mana regen

void_storm.name: Void Storm
void_storm.description: Ultimate: Tear reality with void energy

archon_form.name: Archon Form
archon_form.description: Ultimate: Transform into pure psionic energy

backstab.name: Backstab
backstab.description: Strike from behind for critical damage

smoke_bomb.name: Smoke Bomb
smoke_bomb.description: Vanish in smoke, gaining stealth for 2 turns

assassinate.name: Assassinate
assassinate.description: Attempt to instantly kill enemy below 20% HP

shadow_mastery_aura.name: Shadow Mastery Aura
shadow_mastery_aura.description: All allies gain stealth when below 30% HP

coup_de_grace.name: Coup de Grace
coup_de_grace.description: Ultimate: Series of devastating critical strikes

thousand_cuts.name: Thousand Cuts
thousand_cuts.description: Ultimate: Unleash a flurry of strikes on all enemies

silver_bolt.name: Silver Bolt
silver_bolt.description: Fire a silver bolt effective against dark creatures

purge.name: Purge
purge.description: Remove all buffs from an enemy

alchemy.name: Alchemy
alchemy.description: Throw a random potion with various effects

zealot_aura.name: Zealot Aura
zealot_aura.description: All allies deal double damage to undead and demons

mutation_aura.name: Mutation Aura
mutation_aura.description: All allies gain random stat bonuses each turn

divine_judgment.name: Divine Judgment
divine_judgment.description: Ultimate: Judge all enemies, dealing massive holy damage

trial_of_grasses.name: Trial of Grasses
trial_of_grasses.description: Ultimate: Transform into a mutated hunter

slash.name: Slash
slash.description: Deals 5% of target's max HP or 5 damage, whichever is lower.

bite.name: Bite
bite.description: Deals 10% of target's max HP or 10 damage, whichever is higher.

gold_toss.name: Gold Toss
gold_toss.description: Throw gold coins dealing random damage
